Posts.Content: I completed 20 rounds of chemo and 33 rounds of radiation in August 2017.  Now I'm at the ER every week.  No engery at all, pain all over body except fingers and toes due to neuropathy.  Sweats then chills and no appitite.  Don't know whats going on.  Can someone help???
Posts.Title: What to expect after completing both chemo and radiation?
